metadata.title: CVE-2021-43113 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: iTextPDF in iText 7 and up to (excluding 4.4.13.3) 7.1.17 allows commandinjection via a CompareTool filename that is mishandled on the gs (akaGhostscript) command line in GhostscriptHelper.java.

criterions.comment: libitext5-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
